20 
21     This class provides all functionality needed for loading images, style sheets and html
22     pages from the web. It has a memory cache for these objects.
23 */
24 #pragma once
25 
26 namespace WebCore {
27 
28 class CachedResource;
29 
30 class CachedResourceClient {
31 public:
32     enum CachedResourceClientType {
33         BaseResourceType,
34         ImageType,
35         FontType,
36         StyleSheetType,
37         SVGDocumentType,
38         RawResourceType
39     };
40 
41     virtual ~CachedResourceClient() = default;
42     virtual void notifyFinished(CachedResource&) { }
43     virtual void deprecatedDidReceiveCachedResource(CachedResource&) { }
44 
45     static CachedResourceClientType expectedType() { return BaseResourceType; }
46     virtual CachedResourceClientType resourceClientType() const { return expectedType(); }
47     virtual bool shouldMarkAsReferenced() const { return true; }
48 
49 protected:
50     CachedResourceClient() = default;
51 };
52 
53 }
